home.title: Document Invoice Workflows
home.createLabel: Create a new Document Invoice Workflow
home.createOrEditLabel: Create or edit a Document Invoice Workflow

documentInvoiceWorkflow.created: A new Document Invoice Workflow is created with identifier {{ param }}
documentInvoiceWorkflow.updated: A Document Invoice Workflow is updated with identifier {{ param }}
documentInvoiceWorkflow.deleted: A Document Invoice Workflow is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Document Invoice Workflow {{ id }}?

help.status: status of a document that the workflow is for; possible values: R - payment reminder, R1 - 1st reminder, R2 - 2nd reminder, R3 - 3rd reminder
help.overdueDays: how many days after due date action should be taken ,
help.action: action that should be taken; possible values: M - remind me, CE - remind contact by email, CP - remind contact by post
help.contactEmail: email address for reminding contact (valid only when action is CE)
help.speed: post speed for reminding contact (valid only when action is CP); possible values: P - priority, E - economy
